Text:
Don't waste time and bandwidth, downloading torrents from Janesteve.
He will never finish his torrents, even if you see a few seeders.
Try to check his uploads - they all show zero or a few seeders and more than 100 leechers, which is not normal.
He just want you to check his screenshot, so he can get some $ 
DO NOT click on the image link!

@tch321: I can confirm that this post:

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7512001/%5BUncensored_HD720p%5D_1pondo_080712_400_Drama_collection__Yuwa_Tok

was seeded to completion, because I just finished getting it.  

So before you continue with your trolling campaign, you might want to check out a recent post or two yourself.  Maybe janesteve has changed his seeding policy but you haven't bothered to do anything except complain.

@LemonJ-Lo
